About.name: Sabine Kaiser
About.paragraph: Sabine is a holistic FACE READING and behavioral expert who utilizes modern and ancient face reading methods and body language interpretation to translate all information into a life-changing personal message for her clients.
About.paragraph2: With her unique skill set she helps people worldwide reconnect with themselves to uncover their true purpose in life, understand their personality traits, primary motivators and talents, and enhance their relationships in their private and business life.
About.paragraph3: After working with Sabine individuals and business leaders understand themselves, others and situations with clarity, have higher self-esteem, enhanced relationships, improved communication skills and more success & revenue in business.
Why: Competitor evaluation, investment assessment, and negotiation insights
Attracting top talent for influential roles.
Understanding the motivations of yourself and others.
Why2: Making informed decisions and closing high-stakes deals.
Minimizing risk, seizing opportunities, and saving resources.
Achieving balance, fulfillment, and good health.

About.name: Andrea O’Donnell
About.paragraph: Andrea is a certified Nutritional Therapy Practitioner, Breathwork Facilitator, and owner of Rising Roots Nutrition. With over a decade of experience, she excels at addressing the root causes of symptoms like digestive issues, fatigue, weight challenges, and hormonal imbalances.
About.paragraph2: Andrea's own health struggles with sugar cravings, digestive problems, anxiety, and hormonal issues ignited her passion for helping others. She uses advanced testing and assessment tools to provide personalized recommendations for each client's needs.
About.paragraph3: Her services include 1:1 consultations, functional lab testing, and group coaching. Andrea is passionate about helping to empower others on their health journey through education and offers unwavering support and accountability, helping clients regain energy, curb cravings, and eliminate brain fog.
Why: 12-week Metabolic Makeover Method program - group coaching program
Public speaking for workshops, training and events
Why2: In-person and virtual grocery store tours and pantry clean-out
5-week sugar detox program - group coaching program
Public speaking for workshops, training and events

About.name: Jana Hungate
About.paragraph: Jana Hungate, the founder of BALM Wellness, is a holistic wellness expert, educator, and intuitive bodyworker, committed to helping individuals achieve better health naturally. Her approach blends European wellness traditions with contemporary techniques such as stress management, Neuro Linguistic Programming, aromatherapy, breathwork, yoga, and spa treatments, creating a comprehensive and holistic experience for her clients. Jana is a dynamic speaker, known for her powerful message: "Every BODY has a story."
About.paragraph2: She effectively elevates company employees with a crafted wellness experience tailored to culture needs and corporate mindset, fostering employee well-being, retention, and productivity, whether onsite or online. She provides practical and accessible workplace wellness tips to prevent burnout while supporting brain health and improved self-communication.
Why: Customized Wishlist with Wellness Products tailored to your specific needs (Young Living)
iTovi Scan – on cruise and Orange County CA
Why2: BALM Wellness Bag with massage tools in small pouch – great for travel: Includes Jade Roller, Reflexology Ring, Wooden Massage Balls, Lymphatic Dry Brush (available for purchase)

About.name: Jane Shobe
About.paragraph: Jane is the Owner and CEO of Expedia Cruises in Laguna Niguel.
About.paragraph2: Jane has always had a deep passion for travel and has been to many countries around the world.  Her ideas have developed from wanting to explore more by putting together unique custom trips.  Small groups of 16-20 people on land tours and up to 30 on cruise tours.  She has found that putting together like minded travelers the experience is more enjoyable and a lot of fun.
About.paragraph3: Now Jane is excited to present a new wave of travel hosting health and wellness educational programs through our - New Me @ Sea series of events.  Explore the World – Explore the Possibilities of Health and Wellness together.  She looks forward to welcoming you into our travel club!
Why: Full concierge service for all your travel needs
Personalized and hosted vacations throughout the world

Testimonials.text: Sabine is my go-to consultant for private development and a trusted advisor for our business. Her unique method has helped me gain a deeper understanding of myself and those around me. Through her keen observations and practical advice, I've navigated challenges with more confidence, achieving greater balance and fulfillment in my life. Working with Sabine is incredibly unique and powerful.

I recently had the opportunity to participate in one of BALM Wellness' corporate events, and it was a truly transformative experience. The workshops, burnout prevention, aromatherapy and holistic treatments provided a perfect blend of relaxation and personal growth. Jana's knowledge and passion for wellness are evident in every aspect of each session.

We had a wonderful group tour of South Africa organized by Jane Shobe of Expedia Cruises.  It was expertly handled and became the trip of a lifetime. Saw so many animals and wonderful people. We love our trips booked through Expedia Cruises and will continue booking with them.

Jane at Expedia Cruises in Laguna Niguel is the only travel agent you'll ever need. Her experience in the industry is unrivaled. She can put together any type of land or sea package you'll need, on your budget and on time.

Andrea from Rising Roots Nutrition has made a huge change in my life. Although I wanted to lose weight, this whole process has been so much more. We have worked on lowering the internal inflammation within my systems, improved my gut health and I have lost 19 pounds!

Contact.address: 23866 Aliso Creek Road, Laguna Niguel, CA 92677

Features.title: Culinary Experience
Features.text: What you eat on vacation is almost as important as where you go, and on every Celebrity vacation, we bring both those things together perfectly. The captivating scents and flavors of your dining experience will transport you to new places—without even leaving your table.

Features.title: Onboard Enrichment
Features.text: Discover the excitement of exploring new places that inspire wonder, spark curiosity, and transform your perspective. Aboard Celebrity Ascent℠, experience destinations designed to amaze, entertain, and transport you, crafted by world-renowned architects, designers, and creative teams.

Features.title: Expert Guided Seminars
Features.text: Our experts will guide you in class seminars plus physical training in posture, breathing, mind training, and dance.

Features.title: Entertainment
Features.text: The entertainment aboard Ascent raises the bar on entertainment to even greater heights. With hand-picked, top-class artists and musicians from all over the world, we have two separate casts onboard to delight our audiences in various venues and unexpected moments throughout the cruise.
